Description: The following statement contains a magic number: for (int year = calculator.MinYear; year <= calculator.MaxYear; year++)              {                  for (int month = 1; month <= 12; month++)                  {                      for (int day = 1; day <= calculator.GetDaysInMonth(year' month); day++)                      {                          var actual = calculator.GetYearMonthDay(daysSinceEpoch);                          var expected = new YearMonthDay(year' month' day);                          Assert.AreEqual(expected' actual' "daysSinceEpoch={0}"' daysSinceEpoch);                          daysSinceEpoch++;                      }                  }              }
